channel.title: Need Help desperatly (servers wont work)
channel.description: ok i need some help with this i can't play because of it. I pick a server for example this one shown below. [IMG]http://img505.imageshack.us/img505/38/pic1hd5.png[/img] I then add the server IP and Port as shown below. [IMG]http://img81.imageshack.us/img81/1667/pic2cq8.png[/img] [IMG]http://img81.imageshack.us/img81/4571/pic3go6.png[/img] Once i have done this i start server then attempt to log in but this comes up (shown below) [IMG]http://img505.imageshack.us/img505/9404/pic4ty8.png[/img] It is not just this server that does this i have tried over 20 servers and it does the same thing. Can somebody please tell me what i am missing out/why it wont work? :confused:

item.title: Need Help desperatly (servers wont work)
item.dc:creator: @Mophed Mophed
item.description:
@Mophed wrote:

I have the same problems… I can’t join any server. Whenever I try to join a server for the first time after loading moparscape, it says: “Couldn’t create directory logs”. When I try after that it just wont let me log on.

I’ve tried forwarding my ports on my router, checked to make sure the servers are up, and done everything else (changed ports, I have the latest Java, etc.). It still doesn’t work… I can’t even make my own server.

Read full topic

Becuase you are doing everything right.
Unless it’s a hamachi server which then you need to enter the hamachi details.
